amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to ensure that any carbon emissions standards must be cost effective, based on the best available science, and benefit low-income and middle class families.

vote.text: Amendment SA 706 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 706 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Cardin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 706 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 706 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Cardin.
